solution_line_template: Today, Vincent bought {packs_yesterday} + {more_today} = <<{packs_yesterday}+{more_today}={packs_today}>>{packs_today} packs of stickers.
Therefore, Vincent has {packs_yesterday} + {packs_today}= <<{packs_yesterday}+{packs_today}={total_packs}>>{total_packs} packs of stickers.
